translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽In the case of the three-factored presentation of the dependent origination in direct and reverse order, the text of the presentation in direct order is as follows:

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.79. Saraṇaduka, Ācayagāmittika🔽Saraṇaṁ ācayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.🔽Araṇaṁ apacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naapacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  saraṇa dukaḥ ācaya gāmittika  saraṇam ācaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na ācaya gāmī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve  araṇam apacaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na apacaya gāmī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: The three-factored presentation in direct order:

original: Araṇaṁ nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: araṇam neva ācayagāmi na apacayagāmim dhammam paccayā na araṇaḥ na nevā ācayagāmi na apacayagāmī dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve
translated: With a non-safe-haven, non-culminating state as condition, a non-safe-haven, non-culminating state arises, a causally-conditioned state. With a cause as condition, two … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one … With an absence as condition, two … With an absence as condition, one …
